Body.Content:
We are announcing the create Power Automate flows in Excel feature. Users can now create useful flows quickly from the Automate tab in Excel. This feature will be available on December 31, 2024.

How does this affect me?
This feature improves the Automate work button by adding ready-made templates to the ribbon to enable users to quickly and easily make workflows, and view and manage their flows from Excel.

What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Automate - Create Power Automate flows in Excel
